alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:42PM EDT until April 02 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton .Water levels will slowly begin to rise on the Pakota River near Princeton over the next 48 hours, reaching minor flood stage Monday evening. The river will crest near 18.5 feet Thursday. For the Patoka River...including Princeton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING TO SUNDAY, APRIL 02... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...From Monday evening to Sunday, April 02. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday evening to a crest of 18.5 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening...April 1. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
